item.title: Welcome
item.description: This is an attempt to make hydrology topics and workflows available to whomever. There will be three different resources you can look at: blog, long winded, and projects. Blog is a brief rant, discussion, or workflow that will be relatively short. As you can imagine, long winded posts will be longer rants, discussions, or workflows. And, for the projects resource it will be the very tedious, dense, copious, and downright exaustive workflows.

item.title: About
item.description: About My name is Josh Erickson and I live in Eureka, MT. I’m a hydrologist for the USDA Forest Service and am married to my lovely wife Mandy who is super beauitiful, kind, caring, and patient. I decided to write a blog so that discussions may form and also to provide some of the content I’m using on a day-to-day basis with R. Hopefully you enjoy.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Contact Please leave comments or contact me below. Thanks. joshua.l.erickson@usda.gov
